column5: Is Binbrook a good spot for pike and largies/smallies from shore?
Thanks for sharing. I'm heading out right now to try my luck at Binbrook.
Didn't you just ask that same question on another thread? Either way, good luck.
Check the regs.  I think it is catch and release only?  Cheers!
I don't think it's C&R but with the health posting on the fish there i would treat it as C&R
It is a strict catch and release policy for all bass, pike and walleye. U may keep crappie, perch. Bluegill catfish and carp.
Catch and release is all I do!!!
good luck out there, the bass were big last year, no pike for myself. But had a few eyes follow as well. Good luck, want to see a report, thats all.
A report is on its way! Not bad either, lol. Caught my 1st Pike of the season. I will post pics shortly.
I did ask about the pike yes, but added an inquiry about large/small mouth, lol. I did very well there today, I must add too!

Sooooo????? how did you do today, just curious cause I love fishing that pond and havent been this year. My last outing was comprised of this out there. largies, smallies and walters to say the least.
I,ll be back,,,,,,,,,,,,,wheres that popcorn icon that wayne had?
You have odd definitions of C&R my friend.
It was my first time at Binbrook and yes, it's C&R...plus, after seeing the milky water, I would not keep anything from there anyway!!
